subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Kellen Marshall, the son of Wichita State Coach Gregg Marshall, decided the Shockers were going to have a special season and he did not want to miss it.
snippet: Kellen Marshall, the son of Wichita State Coach Gregg Marshall, decided the Shockers were going to have a special season and he did not want to miss it.
